hackathons.name: Builders Day @ FarCon 2025
hackathons.description: Builders Day is a 24-hour hackathon, running from 8:30 AM on May 1 through 8:30 AM on May 2 (the start of The Summit). Hackers will need to submit their projects on the dedicated FarHack portal by 8:30 AM on May 2 in order to be considered for bounties and prizes.
